Previous comments: Got to say, defensively, rock solid. And really, Fabiano on the goal, Bill, hasn't really been overly stretched, making save after save after save, as though Bayern have been making so many chances, it's just not been like that.
reference_text: Bayern have only had two shots on target, that tells you everything you need to know, they've worked incredibly hard defensively, if they've had four at the back, five at the back, six at the back, whatever, make sure when the ball goes into this kind of area, that's where I said that Bayern would be most dangerous, someone's always been there to make sure it's not easy for them to get the ball into the box.
